name: part_006
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: IRyS finishes her massage karaoke challenge, reveals her score, and the group discusses it before deciding who goes next.
Kronii performs 'Mousou Zei' by DECO*27 while standing on the foot reflexology mat.
Kronii's score is revealed, and Hakos Baelz prepares to take her turn on the mat.
Hakos Baelz performs 'Fairy Tail ~Yakusoku no Hi~' by Chihiro Yonekura while enduring the mat.
